Sennheiser MX 680 Adidas Sports Portable In Ear Earphones Headphone Yellow MX680
AUTHORIZED DEALER! FAST SHIPPING! WARRANTY! TOP SELLER!
Item Description

Buy with confidence, we are an authorized Sennheiser retailer!

Run faster and further, or work out harder. The Sennheisers MX 680 Adidas Sports earphones let you achieve both. Their high-output drivers deliver a powerful and energizing stereo sound, motivating you while you run that extra mile or lift the extra weight at the gym.

These earphones have been designed and tested for heavy movement. Their strain relief parts are made of highly-flexible, shock-absorbing material while the cable is Dupont™ Kevlar® reinforced, offering you unmatched strength and durability. Even under the toughest of conditions, e.g. -10 degree celsius, the MX 680 Sports have been found to function well and maintain their flexibility.

Their short cable allows for a hassle-free experience especially when you wear your audio player around your neck or on your arm. However, you may attach the extension cable which comes integrated with a volume control, whenever you require added cable length. The MX 680 Sports also feature a unique moisture protection system - it protects the sound system from sweat and water, no matter how heavy you work out (and sweat) or how heavy the rain may be.

  • NEW Sennheiser MX 680 Sports Headphones with Volume control & Earfin Clips
  • Sennheiser/adidas MX 680 Sports - Offering you the best sound experience and sports performance
  • High performance stereo earphones with EarFin holding system for sports
  • Sweat- and water-resistant: ideal for sports
  • EarFin holding system: secure and comfort fit during workouts
  • Variety of ear-adapters (S/M/L) included: customize your fit!
  • High-output drivers: energizing sound
  • Acoustically more open - blocks less outside noise and lets you be more aware of your immediate environment (more recommended for outdoor use)
  • Dupont™ Kevlar® reinforced cable: superior strength and reliability
  • Short cable for ease of use while running or working out with your player around your neck or on your arm; option of using extension cable with volume control
  • Practical accessories like cable clip and storage pouch included in the delivery
  • Ideal for use with all MP3, iPod, iPhone (iPod and iPhone are trademarks of Apple Inc. registered in the U.S. and other countries), miCoach, CD players, mobile phones (3.5mm) and AV systems installed in gyms
  • Specifications:
    • Frequency response: 18 - 20000 Hz
    • Sound Pressure level (SPL): 118 dB
    • Ear coupling: In-the-ear (sealed)EarFin
    • Impedance: 16 ohms
    • Total harmonic distortion (THD): <0.5 percent
    • Jack plug: 3.5 mm straight
    • Ear coupling: intraaural
    • Transducer principle: dynamic
    • Cable length: 0.6 m symmetric + 0.6 m extension cable with integrated volume control
  • Includes:
    • MX 680 earphones
    • Foam ear pads
    • EarFins (S/M/L)
    • Air cushion adapters (S/L)
    • Ear sleeves (S/L)
    • Housing rings
    • Extension cable with volume control
    • Storage pouch
    • Cable clip
  • Weight: 12 grams
  • Model Number: MX680
  • Condition: BRAND NEW
  • Warranty: 2 year Manufacturer Warranty

About Sennheiser

Established in 1945 in Wedemark, Germany, Sennheiser is the acknowledged world leader in microphone technology, RF-wireless and infrared sound transmission, headphone transducer technology, and in the development of active noise-cancellation.

Sennheiser Electronic Corporation (SEC) is the U.S. wholly-owned subsidiary, with headquarters in Old Lyme, Connecticut. SEC represents all Sennheiser products in the United States. It distributes a variety of other pro audio lines, including Neumann, K+H, and HHB. Our commitment to the world of audio is simple: we offer products that provide the finest combination of performance and value available anywhere, and back them up with superlative service.
Shipping Information
We Ship With:
This Item Ships To:
Continental 48 US $0.00
Alaska & Hawaii add $30.00
  • This item can only be shipped within the United States, no exceptions.
  • The shipping rates listed are only for residential or commercial destinations in the continental 48 United States. If we ship to other locations it will be listed and it will require an additional shipping charge, please ask us if there are any questions.
  • We only ship the item to the Paypal Verified address that is sent to us at the time of checkout. Please verify the correct shipping address in your PayPal account before making your payment. If we ship your item to an old or invalid address and you are not able to locate the item, we are not responsible for shipping a replacement.
  • Currently, we do not ship to APO/FPO/PO Boxes
  • Most of our items are shipped via FedEx or USPS mail. WE DO NOT OFFER UPS AT THIS TIME. Please see the Shipping and Payments tab above for complete details.
  • Shipping locations are listed on the left or by clicking the "Shipping and payments" tab at top. Please bid/purchase accordingly.
  • Shipping time during holidays may take longer than normal.
  • Many of our items can be shipped 2nd Day and Overnight. Overnight charge is always double of the second day charge, regardless of what the listing states. If the listing indicates otherwise, please ask us first.
  • For expedited shipping, the order must be placed before 1pm Central Standard Time to insure that your item goes out that day, otherwise it will leave the following day.
  • Most of our orders ship within 1 business day. 99% of our order ship within 2 business days. Occasionally, specific orders will require additional processing time and may be delayed further.
International Orders
  • For International customers, we only accept Paypal as the payment option.
  • Any brokerage, customs, and duty fees associated with international shipments are the customer's responsibility and are not included in our shipping charges.
  • If you are located outside of the continental 48 United States, please email us in advance to see if the specific item ships to your location. These orders are generally shipped within 3-5 days after payment is received. Please be patient as they are often subject to additional inspection upon delivery.
  • For International Orders, a phone number is required for the customs documents. Failure to provide one will result in delays. No Invoices are sent with our shipments, if you need an invoice we can email one.
Payment Information
We Gladly Accept:


  • Instant Paypal payment is the preferred method of payment.
  • We also accept payment via PayPal, Debit Card, Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express.
  • We will only ship to the confirmed Paypal shipping address given with the payment.
  • If you would like assistance on how to pay via PayPal or with your credit card, please review our FAQ section below for your answer, or click here to contact us or call us toll-free at 1-866-639-9320.
  • For assistance changing your confirmed address, please contact PayPal directly at 1-888-221-1161.
  • Sales tax is charged for Nebraska, Nevada, and Pennsylvania shipments and local pickups only.
  • We reserve the right to refund any payments that Paypal deems as possible fraud or if the amount is incorrect.
  • To avoid initiating an unpaid item claim, please pay within 4 days.
About VMInnovations
At VMInnovations, we specialize in a wide variety of products including car audio and installation products, consumer electronics, home audio, and sporting goods. Our goal is to deliver quality products to our customers at the lowest prices possible.

Why buy from VMInnovations?

  • The best products, the best prices
    Our team works hard to find you the best bargins on the planet, and our prices and product selection reflects that effort.
  • Friendly, accessible customer service
    Our dedicated customer service agents are here to help you, Monday through Thursday 9:00am – 9:30pm and Friday 9:00am – 5:00pm Central Time.
  • Super fast shipping
    Most of our items leave the warehouse within 1-business day of your order. Additionally, we've teamed up with FedEx and USPS to offer the shortest shipping times and the most reliable service available.
Returns & Exchanges
  • If you are returning your item for a refund, a 25% restocking fee will apply. All returns will be professionally tested before refunds are given.
  • VMInnovations will gladly accept your return within 30 days of the original purchase.
  • No refunds will be given on items that have been opened or used; you can only exchange the item at that point.
  • Return items must be in original box and include all of the original accessories. Fees will be applied for missing items (adapters, original box, harnesses, ect).
  • Buyer is responsible for all return shipping costs to VMInnovations. VMInnovations will pay to ship the replacement item to you. If the exchange takes place 30 days from the date of purchase, the buyer is responsible for the shipping costs in both directions.
  • All returns require an RMA (return merchandise authorization) number. Returns without an RMA number may be delayed or returned to the sender, please check the FAQ section below for more information on how to obtain an RMA.
  • We only allow for even exchanges. Any exchange attempt for a different item will be subject to additional fees.
  • VMInnovations strives to maintain a goal of 72 hour service for all replacements. Delays may be incurred if lack of replacement inventory is encountered. We will contact you via email if such a back order happens.
  • Subwoofer Warranty: Our warranty does not cover subwoofers if it has blown voice coils or if the speakers have been punctured. This is considered physical damage and is not covered by our warranty, or the manufactures warranty.
  • Items returned that are physically abused or damaged will not be accepted.
  • All International Sales are final, the return/exchange policy does not apply to International orders
  • The return policy does not cover damage due to improper installation, if an item was physically altered by you, or services performed by anyone other than VMInnovations.
  • For a free copy of the full warranty details, please send us an eBay Message.
Frequently Asked Questions
  • How long will it take to get my items?
    Most of our orders ship within 1 business day of receiving your payment. Occasionally, some orders may take a little longer. If you're within the continental 48 United States, expedted shipping time is generally between 1 and 3 days to the central US and between 3 and 4 days for the east and west coasts. Shipping to Alaska and Hawaii usually takes between 5 to 6 days. International orders may take up to 2 weeks for delivery.

    (Please note that these are delivery times are averages. Your exact location may differ.)
  • How can I pay for my item?
    Our preferred method of payment is via PayPal. You can make your PayPal payment immediately after clicking the Buy It Now button.

    We also accept major credit cards for payments under $200 by calling us at (866) 639-9320.
  • Do you ship internationally?
    Some of our items do ship internationally. Please note that the buyer is responsible for any and all import/duties fees and taxes that may apply to the order. To see where this item ships to, please see the Shipping Information section above.
  • Will I receive a tracking number once my item ships?
    Yes. Once your item leaves our warehouse, we will send an email to your eBay registed email account as well as your eBay Messages Inbox with your tracking information. On occasion, some tracking numbers may take 24 hours to fully register in the FedEx or USPS tracking systems.
  • How do I return an item I've purchased?
    Items can be returned within 30-days of the original purchase. All returns requre a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number before being sent back to our warehouse. Please click here to contact us or give us a call at (866) 639-9320 to obtain an RMA number.

    For full return details, please see the Returns & Exchanges section above.
  • View more Frequently Asked Questions
